1.4.1.name: wordpress/wp-bannerize
1.4.1.description:
[HOT NEWS] WP Bannerize will be part of the new upcoming wpXtreme!

wpXtreme is a powerful tool for enhancing your WordPress experience. Downloading one free plugin, you will get:

  • a lot of improvements to the WordPress core for free (like a cool backend layout, improved user management, etc)
  • access to the evergrowing wpxPluginStore, where you will be able to download plugins for all your needs

Signup to wpXtreme and win a free licence!

WP Bannerize is an Amazing Banner Manager. With WP Bannerize you can manage all your advertising stuff through widgets, shortcodes or directly from your template. In your template insert: <?php if(function_exists( 'wp_bannerize' )) wp_bannerize(); ?>, use new shortcode featured or set it like Widget.

FEATURES
